select.if: select count(*) from board where (nickName like '%${vo.searchString}%' or title like '%${vo.searchString}%' or contentText like '%${vo.searchString}%') and part = #{vo.part} and good >= 10 and part = '공지' order by idx desc
select count(*) from board where ${vo.searchType} like '%${vo.searchString}%' and part = #{vo.part} and good >= 10 and part = '공지' order by idx desc

mapper.select: select board.*,member.level from board join member on board.part = '공지' and board.memberIdx = member.idx order by board.idx desc limit 0,5;
